com.promis.rtti.client
Class Rtti

java.lang.Object
  com.promis.rtti.client.Rtti

public final class Rtti
extends java.lang.Object

Gives access to RTTI class parameters. Any class inside RttiPackage can have RTTI assigned (see description of RttiPackage for how-to). Also all primitives (both simple and class representation) and String have RTTI generated by default. But primitives work slightly different than in pure JAVA because only classes can be used in RTTI and so only java.lang.* is returned but isPrimitive returns true. (ie. both Boolean and boolean look like primitives)
Note that assigning and comparing of primitives is not supported by RTTI (they will be supported in fields but not directly).

Author:
SHadoW
